mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan( plan_id, plan_code, plan_division, genetic_id, USEE_AT_CODE, ATCH_FILE_NM, ORIG_FILE_NM, create_date, report_id, plan_status, account ) VALUES( #{plan_id}, #{plan_code}, #{division_id}, #{genetic_id}, #{USEE_AT_CODE}, #{ATCH_FILE_NM}, #{ORIG_FILE_NM}, sysdate, #{report_id}, 1, #{account} )

INSERT INTO plan ( plan_id, plan_code, plan_division, genetic_id, USEE_AT_CODE, create_date, report_id, account, PLAN_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{plan_id}, #{plan_code}, #{division_id}, #{genetic_id}, 2, SYSDATE, #{report_id}, #{account}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT plan_code FROM plan WHERE plan_code LIKE '%'||#{group_code}||'%' ORDER BY plan_id DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(p.create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date,TO_CHAR(p.modify_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') modify_date, p.*, ur.report_id seed_report_id, r.prj_nm, g1.genetic genetic_depth_1, g2.genetic genetic_depth_2, s.seed_amount, m.method_stage,r.prj_dtl_no, s.seed_amount, d3.division division_depth_3, pm.plan_method_id, pm.method_cycle , r.PRJ_DTL_NO AS report_code, r.PRJ_NM AS report_name, s.seed_code,easy_d4.DIVISION easy_division_depth_3,easy_g1.GENETIC easy_genetic_depth_1, easy_g2.GENETIC easy_genetic_depth_2, easy_r.PRJ_DTL_NO easy_report_code, easy_r.PRJ_DTL_NM easy_report_name FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_method pm on pm.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_seed ps on ps.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN seed s on ps.seed_id = s.seed_id LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_REPORT ur on ur.user_report_id = s.user_report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = ur.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on g2.genetic_id = s.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g1.genetic_id = g2.genetic_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on m.division_id = d4.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d4.division_parents = d3.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division easy_d4 on p.PLAN_DIVISION = easy_d4.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division easy_d3 on easy_d4.DIVISION_PARENTS = easy_d3.DIVISION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic easy_g2 on easy_g2.GENETIC_ID = p.GENETIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic easy_g1 on easy_g2.GENETIC_PARENTS = easy_g1.GENETIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN report easy_r on p.REPORT_ID = easy_r.REPORT_ID WHERE p.plan_id != -1
AND p.plan_status >= #{param.plan_status}
AND p.usee_at_code = 0
AND p.plan_code LIKE '%'||#{user.groupCode}||'%'
ORDER BY p.create_date DESC

SELECT p.*, r.report_id, r.prj_nm, g1.genetic genetic_depth_1, g2.genetic genetic_depth_2, s.seed_amount, m.method_stage,pm.plan_method_id,pm.method_cycle, pm.plan_id,pm.method_id, s.seed_code, e.each, r.prj_dtl_no , r.prj_nm, d3.division division_depth_3, r.prj_no seed_report_code,d4.division division_depth_4 FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_seed ps on ps.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN seed s on ps.seed_id = s.seed_id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_report usr_r on s.user_report_id = usr_r.user_report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = usr_r.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on g2.genetic_id = s.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g1.genetic_id = g2.genetic_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_method pm ON pm.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on m.division_id = d4.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d4.division_parents = d3.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule sch on sch.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN each e on s.each_id = e.each_id WHERE sch.sch_id = #{sch_id}

SELECT p.*, r.prj_nm,g2.genetic as genetic_depth2, g1.genetic as genetic_depth1 , g1.genetic_id as genetic_parents , g2.genetic_type as genetic_type , s.seed_amount, m.method_stage , m.method_contents as method_comment , pm.plan_method_id , pm.method_cycle , pm.plan_id,pm.method_id,m.method_result, s.seed_code, r.prj_dtl_no, r.prj_nm ,d3.division division_depth_3, r.prj_no seed_report_code,d4.division division_depth_4 FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_seed ps on ps.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN seed s on ps.seed_id = s.seed_id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_report ur on ur.user_report_id = s.user_report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = ur.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on s.genetic_id = g2.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g2.genetic_parents = g1.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_method pm ON pm.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on m.division_id = d4.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d4.division_parents = d3.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule sch on sch.plan_id = p.plan_id and sch.SCH_TYPE = 2 WHERE p.plan_id = #{plan_id}

SELECT DISTINCT p.PLAN_ID, d3.DIVISION, p.PLAN_CODE FROM plan p JOIN plan_method pm ON pm.plan_id = p.plan_id JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id JOIN division d4 on m.division_id = d4.division_id JOIN division d3 on d4.division_parents = d3.division_id JOIN plate pl on p.PLAN_ID = pl.PLAN_ID JOIN BATCH B on B.PLATE_ID = pl.PLATE_ID WHERE b.BATCH_ID = #{batch_id}

SELECT p.*, r.prj_nm,g2.genetic as genetic_depth2, g1.genetic as genetic_depth1 , g1.genetic_id as genetic_parents , g2.genetic_type as genetic_type , d3.division division_depth_3, r.prj_no seed_report_code,d4.division division_depth_4 FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = p.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on p.genetic_id = g2.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g2.genetic_parents = g1.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on p.PLAN_DIVISION = d4.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d4.division_parents = d3.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule sch on sch.plan_id = p.plan_id WHERE p.plan_id = #{plan_id}

SELECT p.*, r.report_id, r.prj_nm, g1.genetic genetic_depth_1, g2.genetic genetic_depth_2, s.seed_amount, m.method_stage,pm.plan_method_id,pm.method_cycle, pm.plan_id,pm.method_id,m.method_result, s.seed_amount, s.seed_code, d3.division division_depth_3, r.prj_no seed_report_code,d4.division division_depth_4 FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_seed ps on ps.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN seed s on ps.seed_id = s.seed_id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_report ur on ur.user_report_id = s.user_report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = ur.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on s.genetic_id = g2.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g2.genetic_parents = g1.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_method pm ON pm.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on m.division_id = d4.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d4.division_parents = d3.division_id LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule sch on sch.plan_id = p.plan_id WHERE p.plan_code = #{plan_code}

SELECT p.*, r.report_id, r.prj_nm, g1.genetic genetic_depth_1, g2.genetic genetic_depth_2, g1.genetic_id genetic_depth_2_id, g2.genetic_type as genetic_type, d1.division division_depth_1, d2.division division_depth_2, d3.division division_depth_3, d4.division division_depth_4, d4.division_id, PF.ATCH_FILE_NM as plan_atch_file_nm, PF.ORIG_FILE_NM as plan_orig_file_nm FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN report r on r.report_id = p.report_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on g2.genetic_id = p.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g1.genetic_id = g2.genetic_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on d4.division_id = p.plan_division LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d3.division_id = d4.division_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN division d2 on d2.division_id = d3.division_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN division d1 on d1.division_id = d2.division_parents LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM PLAN_FILE subPF WHERE subPF.PLAN_TYPE = 3) PF on p.PLAN_ID = PF.PLAN_ID WHERE p.plan_id = #{plan_id}
mapper.insert: insert into plan( plan_id, plan_code, USEE_AT_CODE, plan_status, create_date, account ) VALUES( #{plan_id}, #{plan_code}, #{USEE_AT_CODE}, 1, SYSDATE, #{account} )
mapper.update: update plan set modify_date = sysdate, plan_status = 1 WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id}

INSERT ALL
into plan_seed( plan_seed_id, plan_id, seed_id ) values ( plan_seed_seq_id.nextval, #{plan_id}, #{item} )
select 1 from dual

UPDATE plan SET plan_well = #{plan_well}, plan_batch = #{plan_batch}, plan_sample = #{plan_sample}, plan_aspect = #{plan_aspect}, plan_blank = #{plan_blank}, plan_standard = #{plan_standard}, plan_control = #{plan_control}, plan_status = 2, plan_contents = #{plan_contents}, modify_date = sysdate WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_method( plan_method_id, plan_id, method_id, method_cycle, method_comment ) VALUES( plan_method_seq_id.nextval, #{plan_id}, #{method_id}, #{method_cycle}, #{method_comment} )
mapper.select: SELECT pm.plan_method_id , pm.plan_id , pm.method_id , pm.method_cycle , m.method_contents as method_comment FROM plan_method pm JOIN method m ON pm.method_id = m.method_id WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id};

SELECT p.plan_id, p.plan_code, g1.genetic crop_list, g2.genetic kind_list, m.method_result FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_method pm on pm.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on pm.method_id = m.method_id LEFT OUTER JOIN DIVISION d4 on d4.division_id = m.DIVISION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN division d3 on d3.division_id = D4.DIVISION_PARENTS LEFT OUTER JOIN plan_seed ps on ps.plan_id = p.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN seed s on ps.seed_id = s.seed_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g2 on g2.genetic_id = s.genetic_id LEFT OUTER JOIN genetic g1 on g1.genetic_id = g2.genetic_parents WHERE p.plan_id != -1 AND p.plan_status >= 4 AND d3.division_id = #{method_id} ORDER BY p.create_date DESC

SELECT p.account id, p.plan_code, d3.division analysis_item, (SELECT min(start_date) from schedule sch where sch.PLAN_ID = p.PLAN_ID) start_date, (SELECT max(end_date) from SCHEDULE sch where sch.PLAN_ID = p.PLAN_ID) end_date FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN PLAN_METHOD pm on pm.PLAN_ID = p.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on m.METHOD_ID = pm.METHOD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN division d4 on m.DIVISION_ID = m.DIVISION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DIVISION d3 on d3.DIVISION_ID = d4.DIVISION_PARENTS
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAN SET PLAN_STATUS = #{plan_state} WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.plan_id, PLATE.PLATE_ID batch_id, PLATE_INDEX batch_index, SCHEDULE.SCH_CONTENTS, SCHEDULE.START_DATE, END_DATE, s.STEP_ID, s.STEP_INDEX, s.STEP_COMMENT, s.STEP_NAME FROM plan p LEFT OUTER JOIN PLATE on plate.PLAN_ID = p.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE on SCHEDULE.PLATE_ID = PLATE.PLATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PLAN_METHOD pm on pm.PLAN_ID = p.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN method m on m.METHOD_ID = pm.METHOD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN step s on s.METHOD_ID = m.METHOD_ID WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAN_FILE( PLAN_FILE_ID, PLAN_ID, ATCH_FILE_NM, ORIG_FILE_NM, PLAN_TYPE ) VALUES ( plan_file_seq_id.nextval, #{plan_id}, #{ATCH_FILE_NM}, #{ORIG_FILE_NM}, #{plan_type} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLAN_FILE WHERE PLAN_ID = #{plan_id} AND plan_type = #{plan_type}
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAN_FILE SET ATCH_FILE_NM = #{ATCH_FILE_NM} , ORIG_FILE_NM = #{ORIG_FILE_NM} WHERE plan_file_id = #{plan_file_id}
